attributes.action: Make DJ EZ an MBE for his outstanding services to the NHS
attributes.additional_details: Right now, the NHS is under extreme pressure to cope with all cases of  Corona Virus PLUS the current stress of everyday health issues and treatments the people of our country require. DJ EZ has taken it upon himself to carry out a charity fundraising live DJ gig for 24 hours - but not for the first time either! Honour this mans efforts with an MBE.
attributes.background:
Make DJ EZ an MBE for his outstanding services in raising money for the NHS during extremely difficult times with his 24hr DJ Set as just one of the things he has done over the years to raise awareness.

This man has taken it upon himself to go the extra mile.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 

https://www.gov.uk/honours
